CustomField.formula:
/** IF( (Conversion_Change__c) > 0, IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/green.png","MOSTLY FULL",10,((Conversion_Change__c)*200)), IF( (Conversion_Change__c) = 0, IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/orange.png","PARTIALLY FULL",10,((Conversion_Change__c)*200)), IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/red.png","MOSTLY EMPTY",10,((Conversion_Change__c)*200)))) & IMAGE("/resource/slds_colors/neutral-2.png","",10,((1-Conversion_Change__c)*200)) & " " & TEXT((Conversion_Change__c)*100) & "%"
**/ " " & IF( (Conversion_Change__c) > 0, image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153b000002z7Ro","UP"), IF( (Conversion_Change__c) = 0, image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153b000002z7Ry","PARTIALLY Converted"), image("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0153b000002z7Rt","Down"))) & " " & TEXT(( ROUND(Conversion_Change__c,2) )*100) & "%"
CustomField.label: Conversion %
